mapper.insert: insert into zh_order_receiver_info ( info_id, customer_name, contact_name, telphone, mobile, area_code, address, longitude, latitude )values ( #{infoId}, #{customerName}, #{contactName}, #{telphone}, #{mobile}, #{areaCode}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude} )
mapper.update: update zh_order_receiver_info set info_id=#{infoId}, customer_name=#{customerName}, contact_name=#{contactName}, telphone=#{telphone}, mobile=#{mobile}, area_code=#{areaCode}, address=#{address}, longitude=#{longitude}, latitude=#{latitude} where info_id=#{infoId}

update zh_order_receiver_info
info_id=#{infoId},
customer_name=#{customerName},
contact_name=#{contactName},
telphone=#{telphone},
mobile=#{mobile},
area_code=#{areaCode},
address=#{address},
longitude=#{longitude},
latitude=#{latitude}
where info_id=#{infoId}
mapper.select: select info_id, customer_name, contact_name, telphone, mobile, area_code, address, longitude, latitude from zh_order_receiver_info where info_id=#{infoId}
select info_id, customer_name, contact_name, telphone, mobile, area_code, address, longitude, latitude from zh_order_receiver_info where info_id=#{infoId}
